charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_1101_010:
While [Name:PlayerNickname ] was in town,
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] suddenly happened across Iono.
charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_1101_020:
With a happy smile on her face, Iono seemed to
be having fun.
charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_1201_050: I’ve come up with a super-rad game!
charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_1201_060:
Wanna know what it is?
...You do! I know you do!
charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_1201_070:
The game’s called, “Who’s Iono’s Partner? I’unno!”
Yayyy!
charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_0401_090:
Oh ho ho! Seems like ya don’t know! This oughta
be fun!
charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_0402_120:
Ah ah aaahhh!
Didja say something, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_0402_130: I couldn’t hear ya, so I’m gonna just move on!
charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_1201_140:
The rules are easy-peasy: I’m gonna describe my
partner Poké pal to you!
charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_1201_150:
And you’ve gotta guess what Pokémon it is,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_0401_170:
Gwaaahhh! C’mon, I haven’t even started the
game yet!
charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_0402_200: I mean, no! You’re doin’ it wrong!
charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_1201_210:
Ugggh... [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You and
Bellibolt need to play along with the game a
little better!
charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_1201_220:
I was tryin’ so hard to get the hype goin’, but
then you two went and ruined the whole thing!
charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_1201_240:
Did you ladies and gentlemens watching online
figure out the answer?
charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_1201_250:
Nyahaha! Looks like I surprised ya! I’ve been
streaming this entire time!
charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_1201_260:
And at least I got a good reaction outta ya,
[Name:PlayerNickname ], so I guess it was
worth it...
charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_1201_270: Anywho! May as well tell you all the answer!
charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_1201_280: My partner Pokémon is, of course, Bellibolt!
charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_1201_290: Oh, the cuteness of that face and squishy body!
charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_1201_300:
Unfortunately, [Name:PlayerNickname ] went
and messed up my bit...
charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_1201_310:
But it seems like [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he’s" F="she’s" ] been paying attention to
me like a good loyal fan, so I’m pretty hyped
about that!
charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_1201_320:
All of which just lit up a shiny li’l lightbulb in
my brain!
charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_1201_330:
Since you’re such a loyal fan,
[Name:PlayerNickname ], this one’s for you!
charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_1201_340:
A question you wouldn’t know the answer to
unless you’ve really kept those eyeballs on my
streams! Could be a teeeeny bit difficult!
charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_1201_350:
Heeere we go! At Levincia Gym, the great Iono
battled with the following Pokémon...
charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_1201_360:
Kilowattrel, Bellibolt, Luxray, Mismagius, and...
one other Pokémon! What was it?!
charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_0401_390:
Was that an easy one for ya,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_0402_420:
Oh ho hooo! Looks like you’ve got a lot more
studying to do, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_1201_440:
Hmm... Guess that’s about all I’ve got to shoot
right now...
charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_1201_450: I’ll come back when I get another fun idea!
charaepi_ch0296_00_nanjamo/2301_1201_460:
Your eyeballs are MINE—caught in my Electroweb!
Whosawhatsit? Iono the Supercharged Streamer!
